pkgmetadata.longdescription: Random Effects for the Identification of Differential Splicing // Contains the REIDS model presented in Van Moerbeke et al (2017) doi:10.1186/s12859-017-1687-8 for the detection of alternative splicing. The method is extended by incorporating junction information for the assessment of alternative splicing. The vignette introduces the model and shows an example work flow.
